notes: Run 18 (22530242364): Two new bugs #27 and #28 opened by iamnbutler on 2026-02-28. Labelled both as bug. Commented with root cause analysis on both. Created patch for #27 (renderSelection wrap fix in dom.ts). Many PRs were merged/closed by maintainer between runs 17 and 18 (PRs #13, #15, #18, #19, #21, #24, #25 no longer open).
